trans-unit.source: Converts a <xref href="System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture"></xref> object to and from other types.
trans-unit.target: Converte um <xref href="System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture"> </xref> de e para outros tipos de objeto.

trans-unit.source: The KeyGestureConverter class only converts an instance <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture> to and from a <xref:System.String>.
trans-unit.target: A classe de KeyGestureConverter converte apenas uma instância <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture>de e para <xref:System.String>.</xref:System.String> </xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture>

trans-unit.source: The KeyGestureConverter converts to and from a <xref:System.String> using the "+" character as the delimiter between the modifier keys and the key.
trans-unit.target: O KeyGestureConverter converte de e para um <xref:System.String>utilizando o caráter "+" como delimitador entre as chaves de modificador e a chave.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: For example, the string `Control+A` would be converted into a <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture> with a <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture.Modifiers%2A> property equal to <xref:System.Windows.Input.ModifierKeys> and <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture.Key%2A> property equal to <xref:System.Windows.Input.Key>.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, a cadeia de `Control+A` teria de ser convertida para um <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture>com uma <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture.Modifiers%2A>propriedade igual e <xref:System.Windows.Input.ModifierKeys> <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture.Key%2A>propriedade igual a <xref:System.Windows.Input.Key>.</xref:System.Windows.Input.Key> </xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture.Key%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Input.ModifierKeys> </xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture.Modifiers%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture>

trans-unit.target: Determina se um objeto do tipo especificado pode ser convertido para uma instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture"> </xref>, utilizando o contexto especificado.

trans-unit.target: Tenta converter o objeto especificado para um <xref href="System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture"> </xref>, utilizando o contexto especificado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGestureConverter> converts to and from a <xref:System.String> using the "+" key as the delimiter between the modifier keys and the key.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGestureConverter>converte de e para um <xref:System.String>utilizando a chave "+" como delimitador entre as chaves de modificador e a chave.</xref:System.String> </xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGestureConverter>

trans-unit.source: For example, the string `Control+A` would be converted into a <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture> with a <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture.Modifiers%2A> property equal to <xref:System.Windows.Input.ModifierKeys> and <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture.Key%2A> property equal to <xref:System.Windows.Input.Key>.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, a cadeia de `Control+A` teria de ser convertida para um <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture>com uma <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture.Modifiers%2A>propriedade igual e <xref:System.Windows.Input.ModifierKeys> <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture.Key%2A>propriedade igual a <xref:System.Windows.Input.Key>.</xref:System.Windows.Input.Key> </xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture.Key%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Input.ModifierKeys> </xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture.Modifiers%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture>

trans-unit.source: For example, a <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture> with a <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture.Modifiers%2A> property equal to <xref:System.Windows.Input.ModifierKeys> and <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture.Key%2A> property equal to <xref:System.Windows.Input.Key> would be converted into the string `Control+A`.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, um <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture>com um <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture.Modifiers%2A>igual a propriedade <xref:System.Windows.Input.ModifierKeys>e <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture.Key%2A>igual a propriedade <xref:System.Windows.Input.Key>teria de ser convertida para a cadeia `Control+A`.</xref:System.Windows.Input.Key> </xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture.Key%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Input.ModifierKeys> </xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture.Modifiers%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture>
